## Quick Example

```{python}
#| echo: true
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

# Create sample data
x = np.linspace(0, 10, 100)
y = np.sin(x)

# Create plot
plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
plt.plot(x, y, linewidth=2)
plt.title('Simple Sine Wave')
plt.xlabel('X axis')
plt.ylabel('Y axis')
plt.grid(True, alpha=0.3)
plt.show()
```
